content: Does anyone know of any similar chat forums, just for CCOW instead? I'm specifically looking for books(or other resources) that a CCOW-newcomer would benefit from....
Closest thing to CCOW in FHIR is the SMART 'launch context'.
@Mads Konradsen check out http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=1 and https://github.com/jkiddo/ccow
@Mads Konradsen I do not know of any forum though
Not FHIR, but here's a pixie book on CCOW: http://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=1 @Mads Konradsen Edit: I'm an idiot. Double-link-post-fail. Sorry.
The INM WG is repsonsible for CCOW; there haven't been alot of activities around CCOW as of late. You can sign up to a good old fashioned e-mail list at HL7.org / work groups / list servs.
@Martin Mogensen Thanks! I'll have a look at the Pixie book! Looks like a lot of fun!
